item.title: Video Reviewer - Test and Evaluate Online Websites in Make Money Category - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a keen eye for detail and love uncovering the truth? Are you comfortable on camera? We're looking for a video reviewer in the US to join our team and create informative reviews of online and offline earning platforms.

In this role, you'll:

- Sign up for popular platforms like Swagbucks, User Interviews, Instacart and more to test your detective skills.
- Earn real money by completing surveys, following instructions on microtask platforms, and trying out gig economy jobs (keep these earnings – they're yours!)
- Test the app for around 5 hours
- Document your experience: record yourself cashing out and completing tasks.
- Become a star! Create engaging video reviews which will be edited by professional video editor (no prior video experience needed, we'll provide training!)

Why You'll Love Working Here:

- Flexible hours: work whenever you want, wherever you want as long as it's in USA.
- Competitive pay: earn $75 per video review (expenses covered if any), plus keep your earnings from the app that you have tested (up to $15 extra per hour!)
- Be a part of something bigger: your reviews help others make informed decisions online.
- Focus on your performance, not editing: Don't worry about perfecting your video editing skills - our team will handle the post-production magic!

Ready to join the team?

If you're a detail-oriented individual with a passion for sharing your discoveries, we want to hear from you! Apply today!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:07 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Skills: Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Post Production Documentary - Upwork
item.description:
🎬 Job Opportunity: Post Production Documentary Editor (Spanish Speaker) 🌿 With storytelling experience

Logline: After decades as a Brazilian-American climate advisor protecting the environment and human rights for the U.S. government, main character returns to the Amazon in the face of a climate-related disaster, exploring her identity and roots.

Are you passionate about storytelling and the rich biodiversity of the Amazon rainforest? I'm seeking a skilled Documentary Editor fluent in Portuguese to work side by side with the director to finish the Final Cut!

🔍 Responsibilities:

- Edit and assemble footage for compelling documentaries on Amazonian ecosystems through the story of a native Brazilian

- Ensure seamless integration of Spanish-language interviews and narration with Spanish and English.

- Collaborate with the production team to maintain the cultural authenticity of the content.

📋 Requirements:

- Proficient in video editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).

- Fluent in Portuguese/Spanish with a strong understanding of Amazonian culture.

- Previous experience editing documentaries or nature-focused content.

💡 Bonus Skills: Color corrections and sound

- Familiarity with environmental issues and conservation narratives.

- Ability to work with a diverse team and adapt to evolving project requirements.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Film, Video Post-Editing, Documentary, Storytelling, Video Editing
Skills: Film, Video Post-Editing, Documentary, Storytelling, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Role and Responsibilities:

Content Creation & Posting: Develop and implement a content strategy; create, schedule, and publish posts.
Engagement: Monitor and respond to comments and messages; engage with followers and relevant accounts.
Analytics & Reporting: Track and analyze social media metrics; generate monthly performance reports.
Campaign Management: Plan and execute social media ad campaigns; manage budgets.
Collaboration: Direct video editors and graphic designers; ensure brand consistency.
Trend Analysis: Stay updated on social media trends; implement innovative strategies.

monthly : $60

Budget: $720
Posted On: June 19, 2024 04:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Management
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Management
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Thumbnail Designer for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! We are a YouTube Automation company, and we are looking to hire a talented and experienced thumbnail designer for a Luxury Watch Channel.

Similar channel to these:

https://www.youtube.com/@latesttech3361/videos

https://www.youtube.com/@TeddyBaldassarre/videos

If you have experience creating thumbnails for YouTube Automation Channels, feel free to apply, and let's talk more details!

This is a long-term collaboration with a good payment structure.

Looking forward to working with you!
Milan


Hourly Range: $18.00-$42.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 04:46 UTC
Category: Graphic Design

item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! We are a YouTube Automation company, and we are looking to hire a talented, experienced, and hard-working Video Editor  for a Luxury Watch YouTube Channel.

We are looking for multiple people experienced in editing videos in the luxury watch niche.

Similar channel to these:

https://www.youtube.com/@latesttech3361/videos

https://www.youtube.com/@TeddyBaldassarre/videos

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit, we would also have the full-time/retainer opportunity.

Looking forward to working with you!
Milan

item.title: Video Editor for TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor who can turn our raw footage into captivating TikTok videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of TikTok trends and editing techniques to create visually stunning and attention-grabbing content. As a video editor, you will be responsible for trimming, cropping, and enhancing videos, adding effects, transitions, and text overlays to make them stand out. You should also have a good sense of timing and storytelling to ensure the videos flow smoothly and engage viewers.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Knowledge of TikTok trends and editing techniques
  - Attention to detail and ability to work with tight deadlines

  This is a small-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an expert-level video editor who can deliver high-quality TikTok videos that capture our audience's attention and drive engagement.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 19, 2024 04:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply
